mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unused_daily_mart ( create_dt, csp_type, resource_id, collect_dt, metric_type, metric_avg_amount ) VALUES ( #{createDt}, 'NCP', #{resourceId}, #{collectDt}, #{metricType}, #{metricAvgAmount} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE create_dt = #{createDt}, metric_avg_amount = #{metricAvgAmount}
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(metric_avg_amount) as avg_cpu_14days, MAX(metric_avg_amount) as max_cpu_14days, COUNT(DISTINCT collect_dt) as day_count FROM unused_daily_mart WHERE csp_type = 'NCP' AND resource_id = #{resourceId} AND metric_type = 'cpu' AND collect_dt >= DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY)) AND collect_dt <= DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY))

WITH daily_stats AS ( SELECT resource_id, AVG(metric_avg_amount) as avg_cpu_4days, MAX(metric_avg_amount) as max_cpu_4days, COUNT(DISTINCT collect_dt) as day_count FROM unused_daily_mart WHERE csp_type = 'NCP' AND metric_type = 'cpu' AND collect_dt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY resource_id HAVING day_count = 4 ), recommend_candidates AS ( SELECT resource_id, avg_cpu_4days, max_cpu_4days, CASE WHEN avg_cpu_4days > 80 THEN 'Up' WHEN avg_cpu_4days <= 10 OR max_cpu_4days <= 50 THEN 'Down' ELSE 'Modernize' END as recommend_type FROM daily_stats ) SELECT rc.resource_id, rc.avg_cpu_4days, rc.max_cpu_4days, rc.recommend_type, ncp.member_no, ncp.region_code, ncp.server_spec_code, ncp.instance_name FROM recommend_candidates rc INNER JOIN ( SELECT t.member_no, t.instance_no, t.region_code, t.server_spec_code, t.instance_name FROM ncp_cost_vm_month t INNER JOIN ( SELECT instance_no, MAX(created) as max_created FROM ncp_cost_vm_month GROUP BY instance_no ) latest ON t.instance_no = latest.instance_no AND t.created = latest.max_created ) ncp ON rc.resource_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_520_ci = ncp.instance_no ORDER BY rc.recommend_type, rc.resource_id
